input.sentences: the christmas decorations are the best part of the holiday .
each street is filled with them .
it gets me in the spirit just seeing them .
the fashion along with them are so amazing .
the horses were the best part .
output.sentences: My favorite thing about the holiday season is the decorations that go up for Christmas.
Every street is filled with sparkling lights and brightly colored ornaments.
The Christmas spirit is truly every where.
Even the fashion of Christmas (scarves and gloves) is universal and amazing.
I think that even horses pulling buggies know when it is Christmas time as they trot around the city more romantically.
